研究强调医疗保健领域对可持续人工智能解决方案的需求与世界其他领域类似，人工智能（AI）的光速发展已经进入医疗保健领域，特别是放射学领域。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Research-highlights-need-for-sustainable-AI-solutions-in-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Research-highlights-need-for-sustainable-AI-solutions-in-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28aa0901-3c5e-4512-89a4-584006a96e82 Fri, 02 Aug 2024 14:16:46 -0400 Research highlights need for sustainable AI solutions in healthcare

Ferdinand joins National Advisory Committee on Rural Health

With ‘one-stop shop,’ hospitals offer both under same roof

了解浸泡对卡路里消耗的影响平均而言，零食提供了大多数人每日卡路里的四分之一左右。根据美国国立卫生研究院的数据，美国有近三分之一的成年人超重，五分之二以上的成年人患有肥胖症，宾夕法尼亚州立大学感官评估中心的研究人员正在研究美国人如何更聪明地吃零食。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Understanding-the-impact-of-dip-on-calorie-conspiration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Understanding-the-impact-of-dip-on-calorie-conspiration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=339a650b-93d9-4b29-bcac-6667a57de983 Fri, 02 Aug 2024 01:31:00 -0400 Understanding the impact of dip on calorie consumption
